name: Lust for Life
description:
Our tribute to Iggy and every single one of you out there who embraces life to its fullest. We salute you.

These pillowcases are printed on both sides, one spells LUST, the other LIFE. 

Indeed one more shuffle and you get LIST as well. It's the LUFE combination that stops them from being 100% anagrammatic.

Purchasers of this pillowcase set please e-mail us with your definitions of LUFE! The best, as in most humorously apt and creative definition will receive a set of these pillowslips for free as a gift to a friend of your choice.

So go on, make our and someone else's day!

100% white cotton printed text in black.

name: Tash and Brow pillowcases
description:
For our Tash and Brow pillowcases we have drawn and printed a plethora of notable eyebrows and moustaches. 

These are must have and totally unique gifts for weddings and anniversaries. For an extra $15 we will personalize your pillowcases if they are a wedding or anniversary gift with your special date in red ink on the back. 

No excuses for forgetting then!

We wrap each pair in a fetching cotton tie. They are printed in 3 shades. Dark Grey, Black and Chestnut Brown, all on 100% cotton.

name: Coffee and Cake Stencils
description:
No flat edible surface is immune; your regular AM caffeine fix, an entire cake or a singular indulgent slice, use these stencils for a totally original decoration and experience.

Laser cut stainless steel that comes unpolished and rawly tooled. 125X90mm. Packaged in a dashing letter pressed sleeve.

Housewarming gift extraordinaire. Brilliantly original wedding and anniversary gifts and let’s face it, they are great for you, yes you, too.
 
If you’re feeling inspired by these text stencils then go forth, use your caffeinated wilding to make a difference…. PANIC and REVOLT by joining 350.org. and help stop our climate suicide; POOF or TART your other half and support the LGBT portal and make marriage misery, bliss I mean bliss accessible to all; or imagine its a sneaky morning BEER as you drink your coffee. Best just giggle at CRACK though...

name: Velo Love Anagrammatic Pillowcases
description:
We are proud to present our anagrammatic VELO LOVE pillowcases. 

Drawing parts of the bike to make the letters, Velo, which means bike in French and Love of course in English. 

Your choice, arrange them to spell out LO VE or VE LO. 

 Could be used as a little nod to your changing mood in the bedroom when your partner needs it spelt out for them…LOVE, or on yer VELO!

Brilliant gifts for all Bike lovers, anniversaries, wedding and house warming gifts. We wrap each pair in fetching tissue paper if you let us know it’s a gift and can also send a card with message, just let us know when placing your order.  

They come printed in pale fresh green and light black on 100% white cotton.

name: Tooth Fairy Pillowcase
description:
This pillowcase is silkscreen printed by hand on both sides and lets your children chart their milk teeth departures in serious creative style.

When a tooth falls out the child colour’s in its corresponding placement on the dental chart and the date of its departure. 
Place the tooth under the pillow, sleep and awake to the fairy’s goodies. Repeat with each tooth. Simple. Fun. 

Children LOVE this pillowcase and it’s a wonderful, useful keepsake.
This is also a great gift for new parents as they can write in when the the milk teeth start coming in!


F.Y.I
The reward left varies by country, the family's economic status, amounts the child's pals report receiving and other factors like how much they just know they can screw you for. You have been warned.

name: Calendar
description:
Our calendars present a compilation of your child’s art works, an exclusive art piece showcasing their imaginative and creative world. It’s also useful on a daily basis! This is a truly unique and personal gift for friends and families. It makes a wonderful annual gift.  As fate would have it, we started printing our calendars in 2012, a salute to the Mayan’s end of the world prophecy.

We start the process with your children’s treasured drawings, which we carefully edit and make print ready. Based on your individual child’s artwork, we select our colour palate and handprint each and every page of the loose-leaf calendar. A cover sheet and hanging clips are also provided. Please note all original artwork is lovingly handled and returned to you along with your finished set of calendars.


Our calendars are 9 by 14 inches, printed by hand using silkscreen with non-toxic inks on acid free 90lb weight paper. We print in sets of 12. We can print larger runs please contact us for prices.


12 page calendar size 9 x 14  = $950 (set of 12)
 

Purchase and we will e-mail you the same day to get the process started, once we have your drawings it generally takes one working week plus shipping time to reach you. The turn around time can vary so it is best to contact us to get an estimate. 

Please note we are no longer taking orders for calendars in 2013 from outside the USA as we are currently reached our capacity in print run and shipping times! Thank you for all who have ordered with us.

If however you live in New York state you can still purchase your calendar so please do so while you still can!
